title: MinorFacilitySlot
description: A slot for a minor facility in the mercenary company base

slotNumber.description: Slot number (1-6). Used type 'number' with 'multipleOf': 1 for integers (JSON Schema Draft 7 limitation).

facilityName.description: Name of the minor facility (can be empty string if slot is empty)

facilityDescription.description: Description of the minor facility (can be empty string)

enabled.description: Whether the slot is enabled (last 2 slots disabled by default)
